meanings.definition: People who are suffering from lack of food or nourishment.
meanings.sent1: The starvelings in the village were grateful for the food donations.
meanings.sent2: The charity organization provided meals for the starving starvelings.
meanings.sent3: The starvelings joked that they were on a 'see-food' diet - they see food and they eat it!
meanings.sent4: The image of the starvelings huddled around the meager meal was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent5: The cries of the hungry starvelings echoed through the empty streets.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are extremely thin or emaciated.
meanings.sent1: The group of starvelings looked frail and weak.
meanings.sent2: Passersby were shocked by the appearance of the emaciated starvelings.
meanings.sent3: The starvelings laughed at how they could fit through the narrow gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: The starvelings resembled skeletons, their bones protruding from their skin.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the starvelings sent a shiver down my spine.
